name: Super Dodger (klorpa)
description:
A *very* simple arcade game made in raylib. I've made it just for fun and it took me one evening. I think i may add some fuel bonuses, types of asteroids but for now i'm just gonna release this.

My personal high score is about 15000 and ~1:40 time i've been alive.

Music was made with Strofe. Sounds were made with rfxgen. Have fun!
